Description_lang: Light's Judgment, the Vindicaar's cannon, will be available to choose at your Matrix Core. Light's Judgment can be fired from the Vindicaar, destroying enemies and obstacles in a blast of holy light.Can only be used on Argus.
AuraDescription_lang: Light's Judgment can now be fired from the Vindicaar, destroying enemies and obstacles in a blast of holy light.Can only be used on Argus.
